citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:45pm on 12-Jan-
23. The license was contacted by phone and confirmed that she was unable to conduct the inspection at that time.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:45pm on 12-Jan-
23. The license was contacted by phone and confirmed that she was unable to conduct the inspection at that time. 
 
 
 
End Section
